Suppose you have a script

```{r, comment = ""}
path <- system.file("tests", "files", "basic.R", package = "document")
cat(readLines(path), sep = "\n")
```
```{r, result = "hide", message = FALSE}
d <- document::document(file_name = path, output_directory = tempdir(), 
                        check_package = FALSE)
```
gives you a pdf file and a text file that looks like

```{r, comment = ""}
cat(readLines(d[["txt_path"]]), sep = "\n")
```
You can display the help page for one of the documented functions using
```{r, comment = "", warning = FALSE}
options(pager = switch(.Platform[["OS.type"]], "unix" = "cat", "console"))
document::man("foo")
```
but I can't figure how to make this work in a vignette.
